subSubSection.paragraph: This species was common along the banks of a seasonally wet stream crossing due northeast of MDRS (Fig. 32). This species was previously recorded from the nearby San Rafael Swell as Opuntia basilaris (without infraspecific rank) ( Harris 1983 ). Morphological variability and hybridization have hindered infraspecific delineation in this species, and many named varieties appear in the literature, including four in Welsh et al. (1993) , and a different set of four in Pinkava (2003) ; here we follow the latter treatment.
